description:
Beautiful Studio apartment located in Brooklyn's gorgeous Park Slope. Great light, exposed brick, hardwood floors. Minutes away from the best of Brooklyn's greatest attractions, shopping, food, transportation and entertainment.  Very close to the Barclay's Center, Brooklyn Museum, Brooklyn Public Library, the Botanical Gardens and more!

Convenient location, cute, comfortable, beautiful and has all of the essentials you'll need!

Everything in the apartment.

Beautiful neighborhood! Access to amazing brunch spots, restaurants, bars, entertainment, shopping and more. Only a few blocks away from the Barclay's Center, Minutes from the Brooklyn Museum, Barclay's Center, Brooklyn Library and the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens. You'll love this place.

Conveniently a few blocks from Atlantic Ave -Barclay's Center (B, D, N, Q, R, 2,3,4,5 and LIRR)
name: Beautiful Downtown Brooklyn Studio
